summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the Superintendent to execute agreements with the King Conservation District for Urban Resources Partnership grants for a Teen Recreation and Environmental Challenge program and the Taylor Creek reforestation project; increasing the expenditure allowance of the Department's 1995-96 budget; authorizing and ratifying certain expenditures; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund therefor, all upon a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
